Name: Father
Description: The male parent of the client.

Name: Mother
Description: The female parent of the client.

Name: Sibling
Description: A brother or sister of the client.

Name: Spouse
Description: The married partner of the client.

Name: Child
Description: A son or daughter of the client.

Name: Guardian
Description: An individual responsible for the care of the client.

Name: Friend
Description: A person who is a close associate of the client.

Name: Relative
Description: A member of the clientâ€™s extended family.
